function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Prevalence of a contagious disease may not be accurately reported in the text","Impact":"Misinformation about disease prevalence can lead to inadequate public health measures","Mitigation":"Ensure accurate data collection and reporting, and validate prevalence estimates with multiple sources","Technologies":"Data analytics, surveillance systems, and population health management tools","People":"Public health authorities, healthcare providers, researchers","Owner":"Public health authorities, researchers"},{"Description":"Inadequate healthcare and sickness benefit transfers for individuals below the threshold level of flourishing","Impact":"Increased risk of uncontrolled disease spread due to lack of access to healthcare and support","Mitigation":"Improve access to healthcare and social support for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring, and community healthcare programs","People":"Individuals below the threshold level of flourishing","Owner":"Government, healthcare providers, non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Extrapolation of results may not accurately represent the entire Danish population","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of healthcare costs and sickness benefit transfers for the entire population","Mitigation":"Conduct targeted sampling and validation studies to verify the extrapolated results","Technologies":"Sampling techniques, statistical analysis, and data validation tools","People":"Health economists, statistical analysts, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, government"}]}
